text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem procedure-timing-context-cs

This case-insensitive code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/procedure-timing-context-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
acute Acute Phase (<24h)Procedure performed within 24 hours of encounter start time.
post-acute Post-Acute Phase (>=24h)Procedure performed 24 hours or more after encounter start time.
unknown Unknown/Not ApplicableTiming relative to encounter start is unknown or not applicable.

name: ProcedureTimingContextCS
title: Procedure Timing Context Code System
description: Codes defining the timing phase of a procedure relative to the encounter start (e.g., acute vs. post-acute).

concept.definition: Procedure performed within 24 hours of encounter start time.
Procedure performed 24 hours or more after encounter start time.
Timing relative to encounter start is unknown or not applicable.
